Home

Welcome to my blog! I am a student of mathematics at the university of Vienna and I spend my free time programming, folding stuff out of paper and playing the guitar. Here is where I will post pictures of my origami and anything else I'd like to share. This page is heavily work in progress

Here's a list of the most recent posts:

  • I made half a Keyboard - September 24, 2020
  • Book Haul - September 22, 2020
  • I'm a Kombucha Nerd now - September 21, 2020
  • The Inaugural First Post. - September 21, 2020

To any Hakyll-pros that happen to see this: Feel free to send suggestions about how to achieve any of this! :) I'd love to get some mail.
